flavorText:
Q: Where does a mechanical squirrel hide its nuts?
A: In a bolt hole.
name: Steel Squirrel
originalText:
Whenever you roll a 5 or higher on a die, Steel Squirrel gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the result.
{6}: Roll a six-sided die.

rulings.text: Steel Squirrel can get bonuses larger than +6/+6 due to modified six-sided die rolls or d20s.
The die roll caused by Steel Squirrel’s activated ability doesn’t have any effect itself, but other abilities (including Steel Squirrel’s first ability) may care about the roll.

text:
